message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to me. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. While I appreciate your interest, $10,000 is significantly below my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I'd need at least $11,500 for the product.  This is still a good deal for you, and it ensures a fair transaction for both of us.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I understand the value of your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $11,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach an agreement.
